posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following T207's available to trade for other T207's that I need.  I still need more than 100 cards so please let me know if you have any available to trade.  Cards in low condition, even total beaters, are fine.  I also have 300+ T206's, T205's and e90-1's available to trade if you are interested in those.  Thanks for looking and please e-mail with any offers.

RAW T207's:

Becker -vg- light corner and edge wear
Cole - wavy top edge (maybe trimmed) and horizontal crease, otherwise very nice looking
Delahanty - p - trimmed on top and bottom and spot of paper loss on back
Devlin -p/f- light surface paper damage and glue residue
Doyle - f - horizontal crease and some residue/staining on back
Erwin - p - corner creasing and dirt on back, front image is very nice
Gainor -f/g- light corner wear and light wrinkles
Hamilton - f - light wrinkles and tiny dots of paper loss
Latham - p - creases and a couple of spots of paper loss
McBride - p/f - small razor slash on left edge, nice looking otherwise
Milan -f/g- rounded corners and light corner crease
Otto Miller - p - BROADLEAF - multiple creases and edge wear, TOUGH card
O'Toole - p - multiple creases and a pencil marking
Smith - p/f - couple of creases and small dots of paper damage
Steinfeldt - p - creasing, rounded corners and dirty/stained back
Tannehill -p- missing part of top edge and paper loss on back
Walker -p- small punch hole near top border and a crease
Wilie - looks ex, borders look narrow but card measures okay

GRADED T207's:

Herzog - BROADLEAF - SGC 30 - one light wrinkle, looks nice - TOUGH card
Mullin ("D" shows on cap) - SGC 10 - heavy spots of scuffing on front

Still need almost 100 T207's.  Surely there must be somebody with a few dupes to spare :)  I will take them in any condition.  I have over 500 low to mid-grade T and E cards available to trade including MANY short prints and HOF's.  Any offers, large or small, are appreciated.  Thanks for looking.
